docs.title: Draw Steel Compendium
docs.text: The Draw Steel Compendium contains the Rules for MCDM's Draw Steel TTPRG

docs.title: Draw Steel Elements Obsidian Plugin
docs.text:
Draw Steel Elements is a plugin for Obsidian, a markdown note-taking tool that can be very helpful for TTRPG prep and play.

  • Draw Steel Elements Plugin Install
  • Draw Steel Elements Documentation

docs.title: Draw Steel Data
docs.text:
Parsed variants of the Draw Steel rules and bestiary are distributed across several repos

Repo Data Format data-md Rules and Bestiary Markdown data-rules-md Rules Markdown data-bestiary-md Bestiary Markdown data-md-dse Rules and Bestiary Markdown for Draw Steel Elements data-bestiary-md-dse Bestiary Markdown for Draw Steel Elements data-bestiary-yaml Bestiary Yaml data-bestiary-json Bestiary Json

Note: there is currently no data-rules-md-dse, but its on the roadmap

docs.title: I don't know which to download
docs.text: If you're using Obsidian with the Draw Steel Elements plugin, use data-md-dse. If you want the markdown for any other purpose, you likely want data-md.
